participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easygoing, enjoys spending time with friends and engaging in fun activities.
participant_1.background: I drive a blue honda civic. I got hired last week at mcdonald s. I have four siblings. I m scared of left turns.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves trying new things and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: I am eighteen years old. I am taking a year off before i start college. I am saving money to buy my first car. I currently work at mcdonalds.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1.
Hey, participant_2, I'm participant_2.
Nice to meet you. What do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and hang out with friends.
Cool, I like to do those things too. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite is probably Call of Duty.
Nice, I like Call of Duty too. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but my favorite is probably horror movies.
Nice, I like horror movies too. What's your favorite horror movie?
My favorite horror movie is The Conjuring.
Nice, I've heard good things about that movie. What else do you like to do?
I like to go to the beach, play music, and hang out with friends.
Cool, I like to do those things too. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock music.
Nice, I like rock music too. What's your favorite rock band?
My favorite rock band is probably The Beatles.
Nice, I like The Beatles too. They're a great band.
I know, right? They're my favorite band.
Do you want to hang out sometime?
Sure, that sounds like fun. When are you free?
I'm free next weekend.
Okay, let's hang out next weekend. We can go to the movies or something.
Sounds good. I'll see you next weekend.
See you next weekend.
